page.title: 03KNIVETON SCHOOL BUILDINGS
page.content: Kniveton Primary School is the only primary school operating in our area. Atlow School has been closed for a long time and the one at Hognaston closed 2 years ago because it had become too small although it is expected that it will be re-opened as a field centre to serve the area. Kniveton School buildings are very old part of then dating back to 1861.There are two classrooms,one for infants and the other for juniors.The junior room measures 8m by 4m and the infant one 4m by 4m. Attached to the old building is a kitchen,where our meals are prepared, and a new cloakroom toilet block.There is no hall or gym so we have assemblies in the junior room and P.E. in the playground or the rough field which is shared with cows and sheep.
